0.title: Contrast and Colour
0.subtitle: For Better results, try to print dark colours on light backgrounds. better contrast will result in improved scanning results

1.title: Size and Dimensions
1.subtitle: The Recommended size for the generated QR is `3.0 cm`. If your design requires smaller sizes then You should experiment with the smallest size you can get away with while the qr is still scanable

0.title: ID
0.subtitle: If you're generating a QR for a Knot Product, then write down the ID on the product in the ID form field. Otherwise, leave it empty

1.title: Label
1.subtitle:
This is an optional field, thought it's recommended that you fill it.
 This will help distinguish the products you generate later on in the table.
